@thruster77
Not everyone who downloads illegal video files owns a high def television.  Most still watch on the good old fashioned computer screen--or even netbook, judging from the vast numbers that have been sold over the last 2 years.  None of them require 720p--many stutter from video/cpu overload--as does my November2009 netbook, and my 2003 desktop; both play 480p quality videos quite nicely, thank you--even on my new 23" LCD screen.  It is dipshits like you that cause good people to miss out on their favorite shows because the small-size encoders have "left the building".  Aren't you proud of yourself?
